In most ways, they act like common guards, sharing the same drops and being pickpocketable at level 40 Thieving for the same 30 coins and 46.5 Thieving experience. However, unlike regular guards, some Hosidius guards are equipped with bows, and thus attack with range.

Hosidius guards can be found around Hosidius, in Great Kourend. In most ways, they act like common guards, sharing the same drops and being pickpocketable at level 40 Thieving for the same 30 coins and 46.5 Thieving experience. However, unlike regular guards, some Hosidius guards are equipped with bows, and thus attack with range.

Drops[edit | edit source]

The following drop rates are provided by Jagex, unless otherwise specified.

The average Hosidius guard kill is worth 146.14.

  1. ^ The medium clue scroll drop rate increases to 1/121 with the completion of the medium combat achievements.

Pickpocketing[edit | edit source]

Guards are a decent alternative to Master Farmers, as they give 30 coins (rather than seeds), and slightly more experience.

Pickpocketing info[edit | edit source]

Level required 40
Thieving XP46.8 xp
